author: Daniel Greene
description:
All Wheel of Time WoTAlongs are now in a playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGye3IeTsQJlTnklQHxWhNBETzLc8XtYc 🐺 We’re back in the Two Rivers! Wheel of Time Season 3, Episode 7 — “Goldeneyes” — is here, and it’s a BIG one. Trollocs, Waygates, Whitecloaks, and possibly the most pivotal moment for Perrin yet. Let's discuss the battle of Emond's Field.
